  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Creative Graphic / Motion Designer",
  "description": "Best Technologies Limited is a leading digital agency in Nigeria specializing in digital marketing, AI-driven software development, digital literacy skills development, and website and mobile app development. We partner with businesses across various industries to deliver innovative digital solutions that drive growth and transformation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Creative Graphic / Motion Designer
Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	Are you a visually innovative designer who transforms ideas into compelling visual stories?
	Best Technologies Limited is seeking a Creative Graphic/Motion Designer to craft stunning designs that captivate audiences and elevate our clients&#39; brands across digital platforms.


About the Role


	As our Creative Graphic/Motion Designer, you&#39;ll be the visual architect behind engaging brand identities, social media content, marketing materials, and dynamic motion graphics.
	You&#39;ll collaborate with our digital marketing, development, and content teams to create cohesive, thumb-stopping visuals that drive engagement and conversions. T
	his role is perfect for a creative professional who thrives in a fast-paced environment and loves pushing creative boundaries.


Key Responsibilities


	Design compelling graphics for digital marketing campaigns, social media, websites, and mobile applications
	Create engaging motion graphics, animations, and video content for social media and advertising
	Develop comprehensive brand identity systems including logos, style guides, and visual assets
	Design user interfaces (UI) for web and mobile applications in collaboration with developers
	Produce marketing collateral including banners, infographics, presentations, and promotional materials
	Conceptualize and execute creative campaigns from initial brief to final delivery
	Ensure brand consistency across all visual touchpoints and client projects
	Edit and optimize videos for various platforms and formats
	Stay current with design trends, emerging tools, and platform-specific content requirements
	Manage multiple projects simultaneously while meeting tight deadlines
	Collaborate with team members to translate strategic objectives into visual solutions
	Maintain organized design asset libraries and project files


Required Qualifications


	3 - 5 years of professional experience in graphic design and motion graphics
	Bachelor&#39;s degree or diploma in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, Animation, or related field
	Strong portfolio demonstrating versatility across graphic design, branding, and motion graphics
	Proven experience creating content specifically optimized for social media platforms
	Solid understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and composition
	Experience with UI/UX design principles for digital products
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment
	Excellent communication skills and ability to present creative concepts
	Strong time management skills with proven ability to handle multiple projects
	Receptive to feedback and committed to iterative improvement


Technical Skills:


	Design Software: Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) - Expert level
	Motion Graphics: Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro - Advanced proficiency
	UI/UX Tools: Figma, Adobe XD
	3D Design: Cinema 4D, Blender (desirable but optional))
	Video Editing: Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve (plus)
	Additional Tools: Canva Pro, CorelDRAW (familiar)
	AI Design Tools: Midjourney, DALL-E, Adobe Firefly etc.
	Project Management: Asana, Trello, Notion
	Understanding of social media specifications and platform requirements


Portfolio Requirements:
Your portfolio should showcase:


	Brand identity projects with complete visual systems
	Social media graphics and campaigns that demonstrate engagement understanding
	Motion graphics and animation work (reels/short form videos, explainer videos, animated ads etc.)
	UI design work for web or mobile applications
	Print and digital marketing materials


What We Offer


	Salary: N300,000 - N600,000 Monthly.
	Competitive compensation package
	Creative freedom with supportive art direction
	Continuous learning opportunities and skill development programs
	Collaborative creative environment with diverse project types
	Modern workspace with high-performance equipment
	Opportunity to build an impressive portfolio with varied client work
	Recognition and showcase of outstanding creative work
	Career growth opportunities in a rapidly expanding agency


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;careers@besttechnologiesltd.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note
Your application must include:


	A link to your online portfolio or PDF portfolio (Behance, Dribbble, or personal website)
	Brief descriptions of 2-3 projects explaining your creative process and results achieved
	Samples of motion graphics work (Vimeo/YouTube links or showreel)
	Applications without portfolios will not be considered.
	Best Technologies Limited is an equal opportunity employer.
	We value creativity, innovation, and diverse perspectives that push our creative boundaries.

Creative Graphic / Motion Designer Job at Best Technologies Limited




        
    

        
        Best Technologies Limited is a leading digital agency in Nigeria specializing in digital marketing, AI-driven software development, digital literacy skills development, and website and mobile app development. We partner with businesses across various industries to deliver innovative digital solutions that drive growth and transformation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Creative Graphic / Motion Designer
Job Location: Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Are you a visually innovative designer who transforms ideas into compelling visual stories?
	Best Technologies Limited is seeking a Creative Graphic/Motion Designer to craft stunning designs that captivate audiences and elevate our clients' brands across digital platforms.


About the Role


	As our Creative Graphic/Motion Designer, you'll be the visual architect behind engaging brand identities, social media content, marketing materials, and dynamic motion graphics.
	You'll collaborate with our digital marketing, development, and content teams to create cohesive, thumb-stopping visuals that drive engagement and conversions. T
	his role is perfect for a creative professional who thrives in a fast-paced environment and loves pushing creative boundaries.


Key Responsibilities


	Design compelling graphics for digital marketing campaigns, social media, websites, and mobile applications
	Create engaging motion graphics, animations, and video content for social media and advertising
	Develop comprehensive brand identity systems including logos, style guides, and visual assets
	Design user interfaces (UI) for web and mobile applications in collaboration with developers
	Produce marketing collateral including banners, infographics, presentations, and promotional materials
	Conceptualize and execute creative campaigns from initial brief to final delivery
	Ensure brand consistency across all visual touchpoints and client projects
	Edit and optimize videos for various platforms and formats
	Stay current with design trends, emerging tools, and platform-specific content requirements
	Manage multiple projects simultaneously while meeting tight deadlines
	Collaborate with team members to translate strategic objectives into visual solutions
	Maintain organized design asset libraries and project files


Required Qualifications


	3 - 5 years of professional experience in graphic design and motion graphics
	Bachelor's degree or diploma in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, Animation, or related field
	Strong portfolio demonstrating versatility across graphic design, branding, and motion graphics
	Proven experience creating content specifically optimized for social media platforms
	Solid understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and composition
	Experience with UI/UX design principles for digital products
	Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a team environment
	Excellent communication skills and ability to present creative concepts
	Strong time management skills with proven ability to handle multiple projects
	Receptive to feedback and committed to iterative improvement


Technical Skills:


	Design Software: Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) - Expert level
	Motion Graphics: Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro - Advanced proficiency
	UI/UX Tools: Figma, Adobe XD
	3D Design: Cinema 4D, Blender (desirable but optional))
	Video Editing: Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve (plus)
	Additional Tools: Canva Pro, CorelDRAW (familiar)
	AI Design Tools: Midjourney, DALL-E, Adobe Firefly etc.
	Project Management: Asana, Trello, Notion
	Understanding of social media specifications and platform requirements


Portfolio Requirements:
Your portfolio should showcase:


	Brand identity projects with complete visual systems
	Social media graphics and campaigns that demonstrate engagement understanding
	Motion graphics and animation work (reels/short form videos, explainer videos, animated ads etc.)
	UI design work for web or mobile applications
	Print and digital marketing materials


What We Offer


	Salary: N300,000 - N600,000 Monthly.
	Competitive compensation package
	Creative freedom with supportive art direction
	Continuous learning opportunities and skill development programs
	Collaborative creative environment with diverse project types
	Modern workspace with high-performance equipment
	Opportunity to build an impressive portfolio with varied client work
	Recognition and showcase of outstanding creative work
	Career growth opportunities in a rapidly expanding agency


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: careers@besttechnologiesltd.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note
Your application must include:


	A link to your online portfolio or PDF portfolio (Behance, Dribbble, or personal website)
	Brief descriptions of 2-3 projects explaining your creative process and results achieved
	Samples of motion graphics work (Vimeo/YouTube links or showreel)
	Applications without portfolios will not be considered.
	Best Technologies Limited is an equal opportunity employer.
	We value creativity, innovation, and diverse perspectives that push our creative boundaries.

        Echo-Scan Services Limited to ensure global best practice delivery of diagnostic services in Nigeriaproviding wide range of diagnostic services, including pathology and molecular diagnostics, genetics testing and radiology to patients.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Female Sonographer

Job Location: Akowonjo, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibiltiies

	Operate ultrasound imaging equipment to produce clear and informative diagnostic images.

	Maintain detailed patient records, documenting examination findings and technical parameters.
	Communicate effectively with physicians and other healthcare professionals, providing preliminary exam results and observations.
	Adhere to strict safety protocols and maintain a sterile environment.

	Attention to detail and skill in proper patient identification.


Method of Application

  "title": "Social Media Specialist",
  "description": "Best Technologies Limited is a leading digital agency in Nigeria specializing in digital marketing, AI-driven software development, digital literacy skills development, and website and mobile app development. We partner with businesses across various industries to deliver innovative digital solutions that drive growth and transformation.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Specialist

Job Location:&nbsp;Ibadan, Oyo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	Are you a social media native who instinctively knows what makes content go viral and communities thrive? Best Technologies Limited is seeking a dynamic Social Media Specialist to build engaged online communities, create scroll-stopping content, and drive meaningful interactions for our clients across all major platforms.
	As our Social Media Specialist, you&#39;ll be the voice and personality behind our clients&#39; social media presence.
	You&#39;ll develop content strategies, create engaging posts, manage community interactions, and analyze performance to continuously optimize results.
	This role is ideal for someone who lives and breathes social media, understands platform algorithms, and knows how to turn followers into brand advocates.


Responsibilities


	Develop and execute comprehensive social media strategies aligned with client objectives
	Create, curate, and schedule engaging content across Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, TikTok, and emerging platforms
	Write compelling copy that drives engagement, clicks, and conversions
	Experience in running social media ads and knowledge of digital performance metrics (CTR, engagement rate, conversions, etc.).
	Manage day-to-day social media activities including posting, monitoring, and community engagement
	Respond promptly to comments, messages, and mentions while maintaining brand voice
	Build and nurture online communities through authentic engagement and conversation
	Monitor social media trends, hashtags, and viral content opportunities
	Plan and execute social media campaigns/ads including contests, giveaways, and influencer collaborations
	Collaborate with graphic designers to create visually appealing content
	Track, analyze, and report on social media metrics and campaign performance
	Conduct competitor analysis and social listening to identify opportunities
	Manage social media advertising campaigns and optimize for engagement and conversions
	Stay updated on platform algorithm changes and adjust strategies accordingly
	Handle social media crisis management and negative feedback professionally.


Requirements


	Bachelor&#39;s Degree in Marketing, Communications, Public Relations, or related field
	2 - 3 years of hands-on experience managing social media accounts for brands or agencies
	Proven track record of growing social media followings and driving engagement
	Deep understanding of all major social media platforms and their unique best practices
	Ability to create short-form videos or Reels using mobile editing tools
	Excellent writing skills with ability to adapt tone for different brands and platforms
	Creative mindset with ability to generate fresh content ideas consistently
	Strong understanding of social media analytics and data-driven optimization
	Experience with social media advertising and boosted content
	Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple accounts simultaneously
	Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.


Technical Skills:


	Social Media Management: Hootsuite, Buffer, Later, Sprout Social, Meta Business Suite
	Content Creation: Canva, CapCut, InShot
	Analytics Tools: Facebook Insights, Instagram Analytics, Twitter Analytics, LinkedIn Analytics, Google Analytics
	Scheduling &amp; Planning: ContentCal
	Monitoring Tools: Brand24, Mention, Google Alerts
	Advertising Platforms: Facebook Ads Manager, Instagram Ads, LinkedIn Campaign Manager
	Collaboration Tools: Slack, Trello, Asana, Google Workspace
	Familiarity with hashtag research and trend monitoring tools
	Basic understanding of graphic design principles.


Proven Experience In:


	Growing social media accounts from scratch or significantly increasing existing followers
	Creating viral or high-engagement content that drove measurable results
	Managing social media crisis situations and negative feedback
	Running successful social media campaigns (contests, launches, awareness campaigns)
	Implementing influencer partnership strategies
	Using social listening to inform content strategy
	Managing paid social media campaigns with proven ROI
	Building active, engaged online communities.


Ideal Candidate Profile:
You&#39;re the perfect fit if you


	Can identify trending sounds, memes, and viral formats before they peak
	Have a natural sense of humor and understand internet culture
	Think in captions and hashtags
	Are energized by community interaction and building relationships online
	Can switch seamlessly between professional LinkedIn content and playful TikTok videos
	Stay calm under pressure when handling negative comments or PR situations
	Are constantly learning about new platform features and testing them immediately.


Benefits


	Salary: N200,000 - N450,000 monthly.
	Competitive salary package
	Professional development through courses and certifications
	Creative freedom to experiment with new content formats
	Collaborative work environment with supportive marketing team
	Modern office space with excellent internet connectivity
	Opportunity to work with diverse brands across multiple industries
	Recognition for exceptional campaign performance
	Career growth pathway to Social Media Manager role.


Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to:&nbsp;careers@besttechnologiesltd.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Please include:


	Links to social media accounts you currently manage or have managed (with permission)
	Examples of your most successful posts with engagement metrics
	Screenshots or case studies showing follower growth and engagement improvements
	Links to your personal social media profiles (if comfortable sharing)
	A brief content idea for one of our social media channels


Note:&nbsp;Best Technologies Limited is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate creativity, authenticity, and the diverse voices that make social media vibrant and engaging.",
